title: Yoga, Focus and Meditation Mist - Natural Options Aromatherapy
description: Yoga Mist is a blend of Peppermint, Litsea, & Grapefruit to Awaken your senses, and Frankincense, Jasmine and Ylang Ylang to Deepen your Meditation. 2oz Essential oil profile: Peppermint essential oil: can provide a cooling and refreshing sensation, and has a stimulating effect on the mind. Litsea essential oil: has a bright and citrusy aroma, and can promote a sense of alertness and positivity. Grapefruit essential oil: has a sweet and uplifting aroma, and is known to have mood-enhancing properties. Frankincense essential oil: has a woody and earthy aroma, and can promote feelings of relaxation and calmness. Jasmine essential oil: has a sweet and floral aroma, and is often used in aromatherapy to promote a sense of well-being and relaxation. Ylang Ylang essential oil: has a sweet and floral aroma, and can promote feelings of calmness and relaxation.
